Pre-Game Insights: Steph Curry was listed as questionable due to a right hip contusion
Veteran Draymond Green sustained a right knee contusion
Offseason addition De’Anthony Melton was also listed as doubtful due to discomfort from a chest contusion
Others: Steph Curry spearheaded the Warriors' dominant performance in their season opener, guiding the team to a commanding 140-104 victory on the road
Coach Steve Kerr discussed plans to regularly rotate 12 players
Steph Curry urged his teammates to maintain high energy and set aside personal egos for the team’s success
The Golden State Warriors vs. Utah Jazz game will take place on Friday, Oct. 25, at the Delta Center in Salt Lake City, Utah

The Warriors vs. Jazz game will be broadcast live on NBCS-BA and KJZZ while fans will also have the option to live stream the game on the NBA League Pass and Fubo TV app and website (regional restriction may apply)
